00361 namespace CategoryFunctor {

00364 class Translate: public std::unary_function< CategoryID, const MC2String& > {
00365 public:
00370    Translate( const CategoryTree& tree, LangTypes::language_t lang ):
00371     m_tree( tree ), m_lang( lang ) { }
00372 
00373    const MC2String& operator()( const CategoryID& id ) const {
00374       return m_tree.getTranslation( id, m_lang );
00375    }
00376 private:
00377    const CategoryTree& m_tree;
00378    LangTypes::language_t m_lang;
00379 };
00380 
00382 struct TranslateWithID: public Translate {
00383    TranslateWithID( const CategoryTree& tree, LangTypes::language_t lang ):
00384       Translate( tree, lang ) { }
00385 
00386    const MC2String& operator() ( const CategoryID& id ) const {
00387       char buff[64];
00388       sprintf( buff, "(%d)", id );
00389       m_trans = Translate::operator ()( id ) + buff;
00390       return m_trans;
00391    }
00392 private:
00393    mutable MC2String m_trans;
00394 };
